languages.text: Идира не задержалась надолго среди слуг династии фон Валанциус. Она изменилась в путешествиях с Лорд-капитаном, оставаясь все такой же бойкой и говорливой, но обретя некую вдумчивость. Идиру иногда замечали там, где раньше она едва появлялась — в корабельной часовне за молитвой и размышлением. Странным образом варп-феномены, ранее преследовавшие ее, стали случаться все реже. Однако сама Идира, кажется, не была полностью успокоена этим и в конце концов отправилась в добровольное изгнание — или паломничество — чтобы защитить людей от себя. Следы ее затерялись в Просторе, однако память осталась жить надолго.

Idira did not remain a servant of the von Valancius dynasty for long. Her travels with the Lord Captain had changed her. She was as lively and talkative as ever, but she had also developed a tendency toward rumination. Idira was now sometimes seen in a place she had barely visited before — the ship's chapel — deep in thought or prayer. Curiously, the warp phenomena that haunted her became less and less frequent. Yet Idira did not seem reassured by this and ultimately decided to go into exile — a pilgrimage, she called it — to protect people from herself. Her trail disappeared somewhere in the Expanse, yet the memory of her lives on.

Однако сама Идира, кажется, не была полностью успокоена этим и в конце концов отправилась в добровольное изгнание — или паломничество — чтобы защитить людей от себя. traits.locale_text: Idira did not stay a servant of the von Valancius dynasty for long. Travels with the Lord Captain changed her. She was as lively and talkative as ever, but she acquired a bit of thoughtfulness. Idira was sometimes seen in a place she barely ever visited before — in a ship's chapel, deep in thought or prayer. In a strange manner, warp phenomena that haunted her became less and less frequent. Yet Idira seemed to not be reassured by this, and in the end decided to go into a voluntary exile or pilgrimage, to protect people from herself. Her trail disappears somewhere in the Expanse, yet the memory of her lives on.

languages.text: 伊迪拉并没有一直为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝服务，她与领主舰长同行的旅途改变了她。尽管她和以前一样活泼健谈，但开始变得喜欢深思。如今，伊迪拉偶尔会出现在某个她之前很少去的地方——舰船上的礼拜堂，在那里进行沉思或祈祷。奇怪的是，在那之后，萦绕在她周围的亚空间现象越来越少了。不过，伊迪拉似乎并没有为此感到放心，她最终决定踏上流亡之路。她称这场旅程为“朝圣之旅”，以此以保护人们免受她的伤害。她的足迹最终消失在科罗努斯扩区的某处，但关于她的记忆会永远流传下去。
languages.original_text: Idira did not remain a servant of the von Valancius dynasty for long. Her travels with the Lord Captain had changed her. She was as lively and talkative as ever, but she had also developed a tendency toward rumination. Idira was now sometimes seen in a place she had barely visited before — the ship's chapel — deep in thought or prayer. Curiously, the warp phenomena that haunted her became less and less frequent. Yet Idira did not seem reassured by this and ultimately decided to go into exile — a pilgrimage, she called it — to protect people from herself. Her trail disappeared somewhere in the Expanse, yet the memory of her lives on.

traits.locale_text: 伊迪拉并没有一直为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝服务，她与领主舰长同行的旅途改变了她。尽管她和以前一样活泼健谈，但时不时会陷入忧愁之中。如今，伊迪拉偶尔会出现在某个她之前很少去的地方——舰船上的礼拜堂，在那里进行沉思或祈祷。奇怪的是，在那之后，萦绕在她周围的亚空间现象越来越少了。不过，伊迪拉似乎并没有为此感到放心，她最终决定踏上流亡之路。她称这场旅程为“朝圣之旅”，以此以保护人们免受她的伤害。她的足迹最终消失在科罗努斯扩区的某处，但关于她的记忆会永远流传下去。

languages.text: Idira blieb nicht lange Dienerin der Dynastie derer von Valancius. Ihre Reisen mit dem Lord Captain hatten sie verändert. Sie war so lebhaft und gesprächig wie eh und je, hatte aber auch einen Hang zur Nachdenklichkeit entwickelt. Idira war nun manchmal an einem Ort zu finden, den sie zuvor nie besucht hatte: in der Kapelle des Schiffs, in Gedanken oder ins Gebet versunken. Eigenartigerweise wurde sie immer seltener von Warp-Phänomenen geplagt. Doch Idira schien das nicht zu beruhigen, und sie entschied letztlich, ins Exil zu gehen, um die Leute vor sich selbst zu schützen. Auch wenn sie es nicht Exil nannte, sondern Pilgerreise. Ihre Spur verlor sich irgendwo in der Ausdehnung, doch die Erinnerung an sie lebt weiter.
languages.original_text: Idira did not remain a servant of the von Valancius dynasty for long. Her travels with the Lord Captain had changed her. She was as lively and talkative as ever, but she had also developed a tendency toward rumination. Idira was now sometimes seen in a place she had barely visited before — the ship's chapel — deep in thought or prayer. Curiously, the warp phenomena that haunted her became less and less frequent. Yet Idira did not seem reassured by this and ultimately decided to go into exile — a pilgrimage, she called it — to protect people from herself. Her trail disappeared somewhere in the Expanse, yet the memory of her lives on.

traits.locale_text: Idira blieb nicht lange Dienerin der Dynastie derer von Valancius. Ihre Reisen mit dem Lord Captain hatten sie verändert. Sie war so lebhaft und gesprächig wie eh und je, konnte aber auch nachdenklich sein. Idira war nun manchmal an einem Ort zu finden, den sie zuvor nie besucht hatte: in der Kapelle des Schiffs, in Gedanken oder ins Gebet versunken. Eigenartigerweise wurde sie immer seltener von Warp-Phänomenen geplagt. Doch Idira schien das nicht zu beruhigen, und sie entschied letztlich, ins Exil zu gehen, um die Leute vor sich selbst zu schützen. Auch wenn sie es nicht Exil nannte, sondern Pilgerreise. Ihre Spur verliert sich irgendwo in der Ausdehnung, doch die Erinnerung an sie lebt weiter.

languages.text: Idira ne resta pas longtemps au service de la dynastie von Valancius. Ses voyages aux côtés {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} l'avaient profondément changée. Elle était toujours aussi dynamique et extrovertie, mais s'enfermait souvent dans ses réflexions. On la trouvait parfois en pleine réflexion ou en train de murmurer des prières dans un lieu qu'elle ne fréquentait jamais auparavant : la chapelle du vaisseau. Étonnamment, les phénomènes du Warp qui l'affectaient se firent de moins en moins envahissants, mais cela ne semblait pas la rassurer pour autant. Elle décida finalement de s'exiler – ou plutôt de « partir en pèlerinage », pour reprendre ses termes – afin de protéger les autres gens du danger qu'elle représentait. On perdit finalement sa trace alors qu'elle voyageait dans les Étendues, mais elle demeure dans toutes les mémoires.
languages.original_text: Idira did not remain a servant of the von Valancius dynasty for long. Her travels with the Lord Captain had changed her. She was as lively and talkative as ever, but she had also developed a tendency toward rumination. Idira was now sometimes seen in a place she had barely visited before — the ship's chapel — deep in thought or prayer. Curiously, the warp phenomena that haunted her became less and less frequent. Yet Idira did not seem reassured by this and ultimately decided to go into exile — a pilgrimage, she called it — to protect people from herself. Her trail disappeared somewhere in the Expanse, yet the memory of her lives on.

traits.locale_text: Idira ne resta pas longtemps au service de la dynastie von Valancius. Ses voyages aux côtés {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} l'avaient profondément changée. Elle était toujours aussi dynamique et extrovertie, mais s'enfermait souvent dans ses pensées. On la trouvait parfois en pleine réflexion ou en train de murmurer des prières dans un lieu qu'elle ne fréquentait jamais auparavant : la chapelle du vaisseau. Étonnamment, les phénomènes du Warp qui l'affectaient se firent de moins en moins envahissants, mais cela ne semblait pas la rassurer pour autant. Elle décida finalement de s'exiler – ou plutôt de « partir en pèlerinage », pour reprendre ses termes – afin de protéger les autres gens du danger qu'elle représentait. On perdit finalement sa trace alors qu'elle voyageait dans les Étendues, mais elle demeure dans les mémoires.

languages.text: Idira no pasó mucho tiempo como sirvienta de la dinastía von Valancius. Sus viajes con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán la habían cambiado. Se mostraba tan animada y habladora como siempre, pero también se volvió pensativa. En ocasiones, se veía a Idira en un lugar que prácticamente desconocía antes: la capilla de la nave, sumida en sus pensamientos o en la oración. Curiosamente, los fenómenos de la disformidad que la acosaban se volvieron cada vez menos frecuentes. Aun así, Idira no lo consideró suficiente y finalmente eligió el exilio (o peregrinaje, en sus propias palabras) para proteger a la gente de su presencia. Su rastro se pierde en la Extensión, pero su recuerdo sigue vivo.
languages.original_text: Idira did not remain a servant of the von Valancius dynasty for long. Her travels with the Lord Captain had changed her. She was as lively and talkative as ever, but she had also developed a tendency toward rumination. Idira was now sometimes seen in a place she had barely visited before — the ship's chapel — deep in thought or prayer. Curiously, the warp phenomena that haunted her became less and less frequent. Yet Idira did not seem reassured by this and ultimately decided to go into exile — a pilgrimage, she called it — to protect people from herself. Her trail disappeared somewhere in the Expanse, yet the memory of her lives on.

traits.locale_text: Idira no pasó mucho tiempo como sirvienta de la dinastía von Valancius. Sus viajes con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán la habían cambiado. Se mostraba tan animada y habladora como siempre, pero también podía estar pensativa. En ocasiones, se veía a Idira en un lugar que prácticamente desconocía antes: la capilla de la nave, sumida en sus pensamientos o en la oración. Curiosamente, los fenómenos de la disformidad que la acosaban se volvieron cada vez menos frecuentes. Aun así, Idira no lo consideró suficiente y finalmente eligió el exilio (o peregrinaje, en sus propias palabras) para proteger a la gente de su presencia. Su rastro se pierde en la Extensión, pero su recuerdo sigue vivo.

languages.text: イディラはフォン・ヴァランシウス朝に長くは仕えなかった。ロード・キャプテンと旅をしたことで、彼女は変わったのだ。相変わらず活発でおしゃべりだったが、物思いに沈むこともあった。時にはそれまでほとんど訪れたことがない場所で…船の礼拝室で思索や祈りにふけっている姿を見せることもあった。不思議なのは、彼女につきまとう〈歪み〉の現象が頻度を減らしていったことだ。ただイディラがこのことに納得している様子はなく、最終的に彼女は船を発ち、周囲の人々に害をなさぬよう、自ら巡礼と称する旅に出た。旅路はエクスパンスのどこかで跡を絶っているものの、彼女の記憶は生きつづけることになる。
languages.original_text: Idira did not remain a servant of the von Valancius dynasty for long. Her travels with the Lord Captain had changed her. She was as lively and talkative as ever, but she had also developed a tendency toward rumination. Idira was now sometimes seen in a place she had barely visited before — the ship's chapel — deep in thought or prayer. Curiously, the warp phenomena that haunted her became less and less frequent. Yet Idira did not seem reassured by this and ultimately decided to go into exile — a pilgrimage, she called it — to protect people from herself. Her trail disappeared somewhere in the Expanse, yet the memory of her lives on.

traits.locale_text: イディラはフォン・ヴァランシウス朝に長くは仕えなかった。ロード・キャプテンと旅をしたことで、彼女は変わったのだ。かつてないほど快活になり口数も多くなったが、物思いに沈むこともあった。時にはそれまでほとんど訪れたことがない場所で…船の礼拝室で思索や祈りにふけっている姿を見せることもあった。不思議なのは、彼女につきまとう〈歪み〉の現象が頻度を減らしていったことだ。ただイディラがこのことに納得している様子はなく、最終的に彼女は船を発ち、周囲の人々に害をなさぬよう、自ら巡礼と称する旅に出た。旅路はエクスパンスのどこかで跡を絶っているものの、彼女の記憶は生きつづけることになる。

languages.text: İdira, çok uzun süre von Valancius hanedanlığının hizmetkârı olarak kalmadı. Lord Kaptan'la çıktığı yolculuklar onu değiştirdi. Yine her zaman olduğu gibi hayat dolu ve konuşkan olsa da uzun düşüncelere dalma eğilimi göstermeye başladı. Bazen İdira, daha önce neredeyse hiç uğramadığı bir yer olan geminin şapelinde, düşüncelere veya dualara gömülmüş hâlde görülüyordu. Ona musallat olan öteboyut fenomeni, enteresan şekilde giderek daha seyrek yaşanmaya başladı. İdira'nın içi yine de rahat etmedi ve en nihayetinde sürgüne gitmeye karar verdi. Buna şahsi hac diyor, insanları kendinden korumak için yaptığını söylüyordu. Enginlik'te bir yerlerde izi kaybedildi. Ancak hatırası hâlâ yaşıyor.
languages.original_text: Idira did not remain a servant of the von Valancius dynasty for long. Her travels with the Lord Captain had changed her. She was as lively and talkative as ever, but she had also developed a tendency toward rumination. Idira was now sometimes seen in a place she had barely visited before — the ship's chapel — deep in thought or prayer. Curiously, the warp phenomena that haunted her became less and less frequent. Yet Idira did not seem reassured by this and ultimately decided to go into exile — a pilgrimage, she called it — to protect people from herself. Her trail disappeared somewhere in the Expanse, yet the memory of her lives on.

traits.locale_text: İdira çok uzun süre von Valancius hanedanlığının bir hizmetkârı olarak kalmadı. Lord Kaptan'la çıktığı yolculuklar onu değiştirdi. Yine her zaman olduğu gibi hayat dolu ve konuşkandı ancak sık sık uzun düşüncelere dalmaya eğilimli hâle gelmişti. İdira bazen, daha önce neredeyse hiç uğramadığı bir yerde, geminin şapelinde, düşüncelere veya dualara gömülmüş hâlde görülüyordu. Ona musallat olan öteboyut fenomeni, enteresan şekilde giderek daha seyrek yaşanmaya başladı. İdira'nın içi yine de rahatlamamıştı ve nihayetinde sürgüne gitmeye karar verdi. Ona bir din yolculuğu diyordu ve insanları kendinden korumak için yaptığını söylüyordu. Enginlik'te bir yerlerde izi kaybedildi ancak anısı hâlâ yaşamakta.
